title: Wicked Wears the Crown
description: Kyra tells lies—impossible to challenge lies.She’s committed to a life of secrecy and thievery, but the first person to see her for who she really is turns her world upside down.Wicked Wears the Crown is the first book in a new adult fantasy romance series pitched as The Shadows Between Us meets Shadow & Bone made spicy.
author: Lydia Blake
